	var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();    
	var obj = null;
	xhttp.open("POST", url, true);
	xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json;charset=UTF-8");
	xhttp.send(JSON.stringify({ data: {
		columnsTitle: form.submission.data.columnsTitle,

		email3: form.submission.data.email3,
		email4: form.submission.data.email4,
		email5: form.submission.data.email5,

		category3: form.submission.data.category3,
		category4: form.submission.data.category4,
		category5: form.submission.data.category5,
		category6: form.submission.data.category6,
		link: form.submission.data.link,
		priority: form.submission.data.priority,
		selectchecklist: form.submission.data.selectchecklist,
		checklist1: form.submission.data.checklist1,
		checklist2: form.submission.data.checklist2,
		checklist3: form.submission.data.checklist3,
		checklist4: form.submission.data.checklist4,
		checklist5: form.submission.data.checklist5,
		checklist6: form.submission.data.checklist6,
		checklist7: form.submission.data.checklist7,
